Nose: very light smoke, vanilla, cinnamon, 
Flavour: smoke less noticeable than in nose. Toffee, caramel
Finish: short, slight burn, leaves a little smoke behind
At Miranda’s - not bad, better than tali’s let

on the nose, heathery smoke, flowers, brine, vanilla cream, honey and apple. The palate is bitter, with peat, light stone fruits, a bit of brine and grassiness. The finish has light oak vanilla, brine and more smoke.
